name: LabVIEW Library File
summary: Learn about .LLB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create an LLB file in LabVIEW 8, first select Build Specifications→New→Source Distribution. Then click the Custom radio button and check the box that says, "Destination is LLB." Click "Yes" in the window that pops up. Finally, click "Build" to create the LLB file.

description: Program library created by LabVIEW, a software program used for scalable test, measurement, and control applications; records data from various types of measurement and control hardware, then analyzes it on the computer.
